InfoScreen.Name: residential_land_use_info
InfoScreen.Text: Residential land use questionnaire Perception of residential land use

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_22
ChoiceQuestion.Text: The following types of residential housing units are present in this neighborhood (answer yes or no for each type):

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_23
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there any residential units that have bars/gratings on the doors or windows?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_24
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there any residential units that appear to be burned out, boarded up or abandoned?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_25
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there any residential units where the balconies are poorly kept or cluttered with personal effects?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_26
ChoiceQuestion.Text: In general, how would you rate the condition of MOST of the residential units in the neighborhood?

Label.Text: The majority of residential units are in well kept/good condition
The majority of residential units are in fair condition
The majority of residential units are in poor condition or badly deteriorated

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_27
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there ANY residential units in the neighborhood that appear to be in poor condition or badly deteriorated?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_28
ChoiceQuestion.Text: In general, how would you rate the condition of MOST of the residential front yards/gardens in the neighborhood?

Label.Text: The majority of front residential yards/gardens are in well kept/good condition
The majority of front residential yards/gardens are in fair condition
The majority of front residential yards/gardens are in poor condition or badly deteriorated

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_29
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there any residential front yards/gardens in the neighborhood that appear to have security measures, such as barbed wire or broken glass on walls?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_30
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there ANY residential front yards/gardens in the neighborhood that appear to be in poor/badly deteriorated condition?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_31
ChoiceQuestion.Text: What is the percentage of residential units in this neighborhood that have private driveways?

Label.Text: 75% or more of residential units have private driveways.
50-74% of residential units have private driveways.
1-49% of residential units have private driveways.
0% (none) of residential units have private driveways.
